title: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Online Asynchronous Education for Enhancing Secondary Statistics and Data Science Teaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Concepts and General Understanding of Data Science
context.additional_context: Learners explore statistics and data science teaching methods applicable in secondary education, developing pedagogical competencies based on self-directed learning experiences. Combines real-time feedback and flexible learning experiences through blended online asynchronous environments and face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners can design effective instructional materials using data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Python) in secondary statistics education.

Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies to analyze the educational context of statistical concepts (e.g., standard deviation, regression analysis) and apply them to classroom activities.
Learners can evaluate peers' instructional designs through a peer feedback system and improve their own teaching methods based on feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
